channel.title: [pi]need help with adding drops
channel.description: I've just added dungeoneering to my server, and I'm trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom: [code]#Bouncer 296:50 2478:5 275:1[/code] I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error: [code]java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516) at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:70) [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3... 3... 1... Starting...Now! [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594[/code] Help is much appreciated.

item.title: [pi]need help with adding drops
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Something like that:

#Bouncer 296:50 2478:5 275:1 1:53

I’m not really sure, but you may need to add two lines of drops like the above example to fix it.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]need help with adding drops
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I’ve just added dungeoneering to my server, and I’m trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom:

#Bouncer 296:50 2478:5 275:1
I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error:

java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516) at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:70) [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3... 3... 1... Starting...Now! [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
Help is much appreciated.

Read full topic
